name: Swingin' in the rain
description:
HAVING SOME TROUBLE WITH THE WEB BUILD. COMING AS SOON AS POSSIBLE. Will have to do with native builds if you really wanna play the second this gets submitted~

[WARNING: contains audio-visual jumpscares]

You find yourself in the deep darkness of the woods, with nothing but the occasional lightning strike to illuminate your path as you scramble to find your protective charm.  All the while, something is coming for you…



Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was only one.

Credits

  • Ava Skoog.
  • Sounds mostly from zapsplat.com.

Controls

  • walk [WASD/arrows]
  • run [shift]
  • confirm [any]
  • (un)lock cursor [space]
  • invert x [X]
  • invert y [Y]
